subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Washington’s Gilbert Arenas surged past the Nets’ Vince Carter in the final days of All-Star Game voting to claim the second Eastern Conference guard spot by 3,010 votes yesterday, the fourth-closest margin for a starting spot. Arenas was 214,460 votes behind Carter two weeks ago.
